name: Galactic Heist
description:
A droid ship threatens to eliminate the galaxy and it is your job to destroy it. Infiltrate the ship and destroy the power cores. You have one chance to get this right. Good Luck.

Controls:

A, D to move; SPACE to jump; MOUSE to position shield.

Credits:

Programming & art by me, sound effects taken from https://www.kenney.nl/assets
